error_generic: Oops! An error occured. Please try again later of if this error persists, you can get help here: {inviteLink}
donate_description:
As a Servant-Supporter you can choose a custom color for embed messages and personalize your profile with a background!
There are three ways to become a Servant-Supporter:
donate_patreonDescription:
Price: Only $1 / month!
Duration: As long as you pledge.
donate_paypalDescription:
Price: Only $5 (in total)
Duration: Lifetime
**Please provide your Discord Name#1234!**
donate_boostDescription:
Price: FREE
Duration: As long as you boost.
donate_footer: You have to join the support server in order to receive your rewards.
command_text_dashboard: Provides a link to the dashboard of this server.
command_text_leaderboard: Provides a link to the leaderboard of this server.
